text:
Gregory John Stanton (born March 8, 1970) is an American politician. He is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Arizona's 9th district since January 3, 2019.
He was Mayor of Phoenix. He won the November 8, 2011 runoff election to replace mayor Phil Gordon.
Stanton was sworn in as 59th Mayor of Phoenix in January 2012 and resigned on May 29, 2018 in order to run for U.S. Congress.
